Detailed Description

Interface between the mprace library and the new PCIDriver.

void PCIDriver::waitForInterrupt (  unsigned int  int_id  )  [virtual]
 

Wait for an Interrupt to arrive.

This is a blocking call.

Parameters:
int_id The ID value of the interrupt to wait for. This is driver dependent.

Implements mprace::Driver.

Member Data Documentation

void* mprace::PCIDriver::bar[6] [protected]
 

Cache the mmap of the BARs.

We will map them only once at the opening of the device.

The underlying PciDevice represented by this object.
